item.title: About computable verse
item.description:
This blog will include posts mainly revolving around software and the computable multi-verse.

This is a place for me to share my love for computers and software.

  • Website: miteshshah.com
  • Contact me at mitesh@miteshshah.com
  • Internet identity: oxalorg: https://oxal.org

Support this site

If you’d like to support the creation of more content, please consider gifting me a book from my amazon wishlist ^_^.

History

This blog was migrated to Hugo on 07th January, before which it was generated using Jekyll.

I also moved my hosting from GitHub pages to a personal digital ocean VPS when I switched to hugo.
